alert.note: Alert for Clarke (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 07 at 10:49PM CDT until May 08 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CDT FOR WESTERN LUCAS...NORTHEASTERN DECATUR...NORTHWESTERN WAYNE... EASTERN CLARKE AND SOUTHEASTERN WARREN COUNTIES... At 1048 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lucas, or 10 miles west of Chariton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Emergency management. At 1041 PM, quarter sized hail was reported near Stephens State Forest. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Chariton Municipal Airport, Chariton and Lacona. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
